Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.column

Interface ColumnWorkflow

  • public interface ColumnWorkflow
    This implementation defines the workflow to insert an Entity on ColumnTemplate. The default implementation follows:

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePreEntity(Object)

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePreColumnEntity(Object)

    ColumnEntityConverter.toColumn(Object)

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePreColumn(ColumnEntity)

    Database alteration

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePostColumn(ColumnEntity)

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePostEntity(Object)

    ColumnEventPersistManager.firePostColumnEntity(Object)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> T flow​(T entity, UnaryOperator<ColumnEntity> action)
      Executes the workflow to do an interaction on a database column family.

    • Method Detail

      • flow

        <T> T flow​(T entity,
           UnaryOperator<ColumnEntity> action)
        Executes the workflow to do an interaction on a database column family.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to be saved
        action - the alteration to be executed on database
        Returns:
        after the workflow the the entity response
        See Also:
        ColumnTemplate#insert(Object) ColumnTemplate#update(Object)
